definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)

sentences.english: Rows of winter wheat wind their way to the Colorado horizon.
sentences.chinese: 美国科罗拉多州，成行成排的冬小麦绵亘不绝。

sentences.english: Mahone calls his ex-wife Pam in Colorado.
sentences.chinese: 马宏与他在科罗拉多州的前妻通了电话。

sentences.english: Only Colorado and Washington, D.C., had obesity rates under 20 percent.
sentences.chinese: 只有科罗拉多州和华盛顿州的肥胖率在20%以下。

sentences.english: I am from the U. S. I live in Denver, Colorado.
sentences.chinese: 我来自美国，现在我住在科罗拉多州的丹佛市。

sentences.english: Morning light breaks through the clouds. Great Sand Dunes National Park, Colorado.
sentences.chinese: 在科罗拉多州大沙丘国家公园，晨光透过了云层。

sentences.english: The man suspected of killing JonBenet Ramsey could be transferred to Colorado today.
sentences.chinese: 杀害琼贝尼的嫌疑人今天可能被转移到科罗拉多州。

sentences.english: Remember our trip up to Colorado?-Shut up.
sentences.chinese: 记得我们一起去科罗拉多州吗？

sentences.english: Colorado Springs has the second highest number of suicides in the nation.
sentences.chinese: 科罗拉多州斯普林斯地区的自杀率高居全国第二。

sentences.english: This leaf stood out on a trail I was hiking in Glenwood Springs, Colorado.
sentences.chinese: 在去科罗拉多州格伦伍德温泉徒步旅游的小路上。

sentences.english: Carbondale, Colorado, and schools and Waldorf.
sentences.chinese: 科罗拉多州卡本代尔华尔道夫学校。

sentences.english: It is illegal to mistreat rats in Denver, Colorado.
sentences.chinese: 在科罗拉多州丹佛市虐待老鼠是违法的。

sentences.english: Bill Ritter ordered flags to fly at half-staff Monday.
sentences.chinese: 科罗拉多州州长比尔里特下令星期一降半旗。
你知道科罗拉多州的人口吗？

sentences.english: Portfolio site for Rob DeFore, located in Denver, Colorado, USA.
sentences.chinese: 罗布德福雷现场组合在丹佛，科罗拉多州，位于美国。

sentences.english: We live in Colorado which is in the middle of the UnitedStates.
sentences.chinese: 我们生活在美国中部的科罗拉多州。

sentences.english: The view looking up in an aspen grove near St. Elmo, Colorado
sentences.chinese: 在科罗拉多州圣埃尔莫附近的山杨林里所观察的景点。
